titleStmt.title: The narrative of Mr. John Fitz-Gerrald late of the order of St. Francis, in the kingdom of Ireland ...
titleStmt.author: Fitz-Gerrald, John.

notesStmt.note: Subtitle: Wherein is contained 1. Several things relating to the Irish plot ... 2. The intrigue of sympson Tonge ... 3. An account of Captain Elie and their cursed contrivance to undermine the Protestant religion ... 4. The strange and wonderful manner of his conversion from popery ...
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
